original_title: Ailleurs ou la poésie des amours perdues et des lettres jaunies
overview: A man and a woman meet after years being separated. They speak about the past, love, sex and random things. He wants her but she is unsure. In a parked car facing Montreal skyline, the couple get high thinking about tomorrow.
title: Ailleurs ou la poésie des amours perdues et des lettres jaunies
